StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateHS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@mcc_code varchar(5), @dod_code varchar(20), @school_name varchar(40), @street varchar(40), @city varchar(20), @state_code varchar(2), @zip_code varchar(9), @phone_number varchar(10), @school_year int as
declare @organiza.on_id int, @school_code int, @user_login varchar(15), @school_type varchar(2)
set @organiza.on_id = (select ORGANIZATION_ID from RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION where MCC_CODE = @mcc_code)
if @organiza.on_id is null print 'Invalid MCC Code was entered!'
if @organiza.on_id is null RETURN
--School Type Logic if substring(@dod_code,1,2) = 'CC' set @school_type = 'CC' else set @school_type = 'HS'
--Gets current user set @user_login = (select current_user)
if exists (select 1 from HIGH_SCHOOL where DOD_CODE = @dod_code)
update HIGH_SCHOOL set ORGANIZATION_ID = @organiza.on_id, STATE_CODE = @state_code, HIGHSCHOOL_NAME = @school_name, TELEPHONE_NUMBER = @phone_number, STREET = @street, CITY = @city, ZIP_CODE = @zip_code, DELETED = 'N', SCHOOL_TYPE = @school_type, USER_LOGIN = @user_login, UPDATE_DATE = getdate(), EFFECTIVE_DATE = getdate() where DOD_CODE = @dod_code
else
insert HIGH_SCHOOL (ORGANIZATION_ID,STATE_CODE,HIGHSCHOOL_NAME,TELEPHONE_NUMBER,STREET, CITY,ZIP_CODE,DELETED,DOD_CODE,SCHOOL_TYPE,USER_LOGIN,UPDATE_DATE,EFFECTIVE_DATE) values (@organiza.on_id, @state_code, @school_name, @phone_number, @street, @city, @zip_code, 'N',@dod_code, @school_type, @user_login, getdate(),getdate())
print 'The School Was added. Please Check the applica.on to con.rm'
set @school_code = (select SCHOOL_CODE from HIGH_SCHOOL where DOD_CODE = @dod_code)
if not exists(select 1 from HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE where SCHOOL_CODE = @school_code and SCHOOL_YEAR = @school_year ) insert HIGH_SCHOOL_PROFILE (SCHOOL_CODE,SCHOOL_YEAR, MALE_SENIORS,FEMALE_SENIORS,ASVAB_RESP,USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) values (@school_code, @school_year, 0,0,'N',@user_login, getdate())
print 'The School Was added. Please Check the applica.on to con.rm'
